articles.author: Paul Godfrey
articles.title: Scientists reveal new species of horned dinosaur that roamed northern U.S. - UPI News
articles.description: American scientists have unveiled a new species of horned dinosaur which at 11,000 lbs and 22 feet long is the largest centrosaurine ever found in North America and roamed the swamps of what is now Montana.
articles.content: June 20 (UPI) -- American scientists announced Thursday the discovery of a new species of horned dinosaur which at 11,000 pounds and 22 feet long is the largest centrosaurine ever found in North Amer… [+4742 chars]
